translations.text: Nígbà tí àrànṣe Allāhu (lórí ọ̀tá ẹ̀sìn) àti ṣíṣí ìlú (Mọ́kkah) bá ṣẹlẹ̀,
tí o sì rí àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n wọnú ẹ̀sìn Allāhu níjọníjọ,
nítorí náà, ṣe àfọ̀mọ́ àti ẹyìn fún Olúwa rẹ. Kí o sì tọrọ àforíjìn lọ́dọ̀ Rẹ̀.Dájúdájú Ó ń jẹ́ Olùgba-ìronúpìwàdà. <sup foot_note=148079>1</sup>
